text: Ane ame temani bara kutumbomam vahencani kari, sauna alaga-alaga jutha nakki kari didha ane ame musa (a.Sa.)Ne adesa apyo jyare ke temani kaume temani pase pani mangyum, ke potani lakadine pela paththara para maro, basa! Tarata ja temanthi bara jharanam phuti nikalya, dareka vyakti'e potani pani pivani jagya jani lidhi ane ame temana para vadala dvara chanyado karyo, ane temane “man” ane “salva” (jannati khoraka) pahoncadyum, kha'o pavitra vastu'o manthi, je ame tamane api che ane te'o'e amarum kami pana nukasana na karyu, parantu potanum ja nukasana karata hata
